price: Di antara orang-orang Arab Badui itu, ada orang yang memandang apa yang dinafkahkannya (di jalan Allah) sebagai suatu kerugian dan dia menanti-nanti marabahaya menimpamu, merekalah yang akan ditimpa marabahaya.  Dan Allah Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ مَغۡرَمٗا وَيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ ٱلدَّوَآئِرَۚ عَلَيۡهِمۡ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-aʿrābi man yattakhidhu mā yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbaṣu bikumu al-dawāira ʿalayhim dāiratu al-sawi wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
